overview: Filmed at the Kinetik Festival in Montreal 2011 and other cities during Front Line Assembly's "Improved.Electronic.Device Tour (North America), KAMPFBEREIT [combat-ready} puts you front row and center at a concert of one of the original seminal Industrial bands, Front Line Assembly. A hidden track reveals the answer to the mystery of Soy Leeb.
title: Front Line Assembly: Kampfbereit
